description: Returns the metadata associated to the specified billing view ARN.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

nested_items.name: billingView
nested_items.description: The billing view element associated with the specified ARN.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A list of names of the billing view.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the billing view.

nested_items.name: ownerAccountId
nested_items.description: The list of owners of the billing view.

nested_items.name: dataFilterExpression
nested_items.description: See Expression. Billing view only supports LINKED_ACCOUNT and Tags.

nested_items.name: dimensions
nested_items.description: The specific Dimension to use for Expression.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The names of the metadata types that you can use to filter and group your results.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The metadata values that you can use to filter and group your results.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The specific value of the tag.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the billing view was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the billing view was last updated.
